info.description: This is API documentation for Project.
info.title: Qpay API

get.description: Retrieve a list of all commissions.

post.description: Create a new commission with the provided details.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific commission by its ID.
Retrieve a list of all gateways.
Retrieve details of a specific gateway by its ID.

patch.description: Update the status of a specific gateway by its ID.

post.description: Register a new admin with the provided details.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all transactions.
Retrieve details of a specific transaction by its ID.

patch.description: Update the status of a specific transaction by its ID.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users.
Retrieve details of a specific user by its ID.

patch.description: Update the status of a specific user by its ID.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all bank accounts associated with the authenticated user.
get.summary: List all bank accounts for the authenticated user

post.description: Register a new bank account for the authenticated user with the provided SHEBA number.
post.summary: Register a new bank account for the authenticated user

500.description: {"status": "error", "message": "Internal server error in create bank account"}

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific bank account associated with the authenticated user.
get.summary: Find a bank account by ID for the authenticated user

delete.description: Delete a specific bank account associated with the authenticated user.
delete.summary: Delete a bank account by ID for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve a list of all gateways associated with the authenticated user.
get.summary: List all gateways for the authenticated user

400.description: {"status": "error", "message": "You didn't add any gateway. Please register a gateway!"}

post.description: Register a new gateway with the provided details.
post.summary: Register a new gateway for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve a list of all active commissions.
Retrieve details of a specific gateway associated with the authenticated user.
get.summary: Find a gateway by ID for the authenticated user

patch.description: Update details of a specific gateway associated with the authenticated user.
patch.summary: Update a gateway for the authenticated user

patch.description: Purchase an address for a specific gateway associated with the authenticated user.
patch.summary: Purchase an address for a gateway

post.description: Log in a user using email/phone and password.
Create a new user with the provided information.
Create a new transaction with the provided payment details.
post.summary: Create a new transaction for the authenticated user

post.description: Filter transactions based on start date, end date, and payment amount range.
post.summary: Filter transactions for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific transaction associated with the authenticated user.
get.summary: Find a transaction by ID for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve a list of all transactions associated with the authenticated user.
get.summary: List all transactions for the authenticated user

post.description: Begin a payment transaction with the provided payment details.

get.description: Get transaction details to start a payment transaction.
get.summary: Get transaction details for starting a transaction

post.description: Verify a transaction by tracking code and retrieve its details.
post.summary: Verify a transaction by tracking code
